title: The.Walking.Dead.(Episode 1-5).and.400 Days.Repack.R.G.Catalyst
description:
The.Walking.Dead.(Episode 1-5).and.400 Days.Repack.R.G.Catalyst



Released: 2012
Genre: Adventure / 3D / 3rd Person
Game Version: 1.0.0.23 (2013.4.4.20609)
Language: Russian, English
Sound language: English
Publication Type: Repack
Crack: from RELOADED

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Operating system: Windows XP / Seven
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor with a clock frequency of 2.0 GHz
Memory: 1 Gb
Video: 256 MB of graphics memory with support for Shader Model 3.0
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
Free hard drive space: 2 GB



Episode 1 - A New Day 

The Walking Dead: The Game - adventure game with elements of "horror".Plot of the highlights of the new adventures of the "survivors" that it is reasonable to set out to escape from Atlanta in the light of the invasion of zombies.Look at what happened in the first days of the apocalypse unexpectedly appeared, and take part in events that somehow intersect with the exploits of Sheriff Rick Grimes.

Episode 2 - Starved for Help 

The episode tells about a group of characters from the first part, which manage to escape from the undead in the new shelter.
But there is a problem rapidly and water supply, as they are in short supply.People are beginning to starve, and panic only increased.At one point, a man named Endre St John Lee offers and other survivors to move to his farm where you can find plenty of food supplies.Unfortunately, this would be very difficult, because other than that of the road to meet with bloodthirsty zombies, now has a new enemy to fear: the bandits.

Episode 3 - Long Road Ahead 

The event takes place on the subject, created by Robert Kirkmanom.
As a result of betrayal in the group is a terrible event.
It is the most emotionally intense episode!
Was it right to your hard choices in the first two episodes?

Episode 4 - Around Every Corner 

The episode on the number of unexpected plot twists is probably the first place among all the other episodes.
The feeling of hopelessness is happening more and more enveloping.
Watching the characters, you can see that they are not themselves believe in their salvation, and some even openly talking about it.
Subtly helps to feel the emotions of the characters acting is great: it is worth noting very natural to play a character and Kenny Lee.

Episode 5 - No Time Left 

In this episode of the long journey squad survivors, led by Lee and his little companion Clem is coming to a close, and now become clear - can the developers to fulfill their promises made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹at the beginning of the path.

Extra Episode "400 Days"

An additional episode of "400 Days", which events are developing a truck parked near the Georgia Highway, will tell you five related stories of survival in a zombie apocalypse.On the first day of a deadly plague was 400 days, The Walking Dead: Day 400 offers even
more horror and human drama from Robert Kirkman and holders of awards - the studio Telltale.The consequences of your decisions made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹during the passage of the first five episodes are displayed in '400 Days' and the choices you make here will also appear in the second season.


REPACK FEATURES:

Do not cut / repacked game archives
Used crack from Tolma4 Team (Version 1.6 from 15.07.13)
